title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure Global DNS resolution: Introducing Route 53 Global Resolver (NET217)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 安全全球DNS解析：介绍Route 53全球解析器 (NET217)
abstract: Amazon Route 53 Global Resolver is a new service providing global anycast and secure DNS resolution for on-premises, branch office, and remote clients. Learn how to enable Global Resolver for split-traffic query resolution of public internet domains and private AWS-hosted domains, optimizing for low latency based on client location. Discover security controls protecting against DNS exfiltration attacks and enhance query privacy through DNS-over-HTTPs/DNS-over-TLS protocols. Global Resolver delivers reliable, secure DNS resolution for remote clients while minimizing additional infrastructure requirements.
abstract_cn: Amazon Route 53 全球解析器是一项新服务，为本地、分支机构和远程客户端提供全球任播和安全的DNS解析。了解如何启用全球解析器进行公共互联网域名和私有AWS托管域名的分流查询解析，基于客户端位置优化低延迟。探索防护DNS数据泄露攻击的安全控制，并通过DNS-over-HTTPS/DNS-over-TLS协议增强查询隐私。全球解析器为远程客户端提供可靠、安全的DNS解析，同时最大限度地减少额外的基础设施需求。
